member.name: M:Document_Converter.frm_Main.ConvertToWordTemplate(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method performs the actual conversion of the original Word file into the new Template format
member.param: The path to the original document you wish to convert
The path to the template file you want the original converted into
The output directory where the converted file should be saved
The string that should be prefixed to the new file name (optional)
